content: - purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together m1l make 1 left pick up the bar between the stitches and bringing the needle from the front to the back and then knit into the back of the stitch ssk -slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time then knit the 2 slipped stitches together through the back loop mc -main color cc contrast color i hope you enjoy knitting the sheep socks i love seeing your socks on instagram share them with the hashtag #sheepsockdesignbytiny you can find me on instagram @design_by_tiny
